item.description: Entering Lane County on OR-99E south on the Willamette River bridge. Many of the counties on western Oregon put logos on their county welcome signs.

item.title: I-15 North - Utah County
item.description: Entering Utah County on I-15 northbound. Utah County is the southern part of the Salt Lake City metropolitan area. Provo is the county seat of Utah County.

item.title: UT-28 North - Juab County
item.description: Entering Juab County on UT-28 north. This county line sign is non typical in that it is not written in all capitol letters.

item.title: US-89 North - Sanpete County
item.description: Entering Sanpete County on US-89 north.

item.title: UT-24 West - Piute County
item.description: Entering Piute County on UT-24 west.

item.title: US-64 West - Rio Arriba County Line
item.description: Rio Arriba County Line on US-64 west, leaving Tres Piedras.

item.title: US-285 North - Conejos County
item.description: Conejos County on US-285 north at the Colorado/New Mexico line. Conejos is spanish for Rabbit.

item.title: ID-44 East - Entering Ada County
item.description: Entering Ada County on ID-44 east. Ada County is home to Boise, the capital of Idaho, and is the most populous county in the state.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 34 and 32
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 34 - Loop 375/Joe Battle Blvd./Americas Ave. Exit 34 is currently closed due to construction.

item.title: I-10 West - El Paso County Line
item.description: El Paso County Line on I-10 west. The speed limit on I-10 drops from 80 MPH, to 75 MPH at the county line. A 75 MPH speed limit sign can be seen in the background.

item.title: I-10 West - Hudspeth County/Mountain Time
item.description: Entering Hudspeth County and Mountain Time Zone on I-10 west.

item.title: RM-652 West - Culberson County
item.description: Culberson County Line on RM-652 west.

item.title: TX-302 West - Reeves County Line
item.description: Reeves County Line on TX-302 west, crossing the Pecos River (dry when this photo was taken).

item.title: US-380 East - Lincoln County
item.description: Entering Lincoln County on US-380 east. Typically New Mexico county line signs have, have the text County Line beneath the county name.

item.title: I-10 West - Hidalgo County Line
item.description: Hidalgo County Line on I-10 west. Hidalgo County is the in the southwest corner of New Mexico.

item.title: I-10 West - Luna County Line
item.description: Luna County Line on I-10 west.

item.title: TX-18 South - Texas State Line
item.description: Texas State Line on TX-18 south. In the background is the first TX-18 shield, Winkler County Line, and larger Texas welcome sign. Taken at the New Mexico state line.

item.title: US-380 East - Lea County Line
item.description: Lea County Line on US-380 east.

item.title: US-82 East - Eddy County Line
item.description: Eddy County Line on US-82 east.

item.title: US-491 North - Welcome To Utah
item.description: Welcome to Utah on US-491 north at the Colorado-Utah Border. Also entering San Juan County.

item.title: US-550 North - San Juan County Line
item.description: San Juan County Line on US-550 north.

item.title: US-550 North - Rio Arriba County Line
item.description: Rio Arriba County Line on US-550 north.

item.title: I-40 East - Cibola County Line
item.description: Cibola County Line on I-40 east.

item.title: UT-95 East - San Juan County
item.description: Entering San Juan County on UT-95 east, crossing the Colorado River. This is the backwaters of Lake Powell, near Hite Marina.

item.title: OR-140 East - Entering Harney County
item.description: Entering Harney County on OR-140 east. Taken at the Harney-Lake County Line. OR-140 briefly enters Harney County before leaving Oregon.

item.title: US-395 North - Mono County
item.description: Mono County Line on US-395 north.

item.title: CA-14 South - Los Angeles County Line
item.description: Los Angeles County Line on CA-14 south. Los Angeles County is the most populous county in the United States according to the 2010 US Census.

item.title: US-6 West - Inyo County Line
item.description: Inyo County Line on US-6 west. Taken at the Mono-Inyo county line.

item.title: US-6 West - Mineral County Line
item.description: US-6 West at Mineral County Line. Taken at the Mineral - Esmeralda County Line.

item.title: US-6 West/US-95 North - Esmeralda County Line
item.description: Esmeralda County Line on US-6 West/US-95 North leaving Tonopah. Taken at the Esmeralda-Nye County Line.

item.title: I-205 North - Entering Portland and Multnomah County
item.description: Entering Portland on I-205 North. Also entering Multnomah County.

item.title: I-5 North - Entering Washington County
item.description: Entering Washington County on I-5 north in Wilsonville.

item.title: US-93 North - Elko County
item.description: Entering Elko County on US-93 north. Elko County is the fourth largest county by area in the lower 48 states.

item.title: US-93 North - White Pine County Line
item.description: White Pine County Line on US-93 north. The sign behind the county line designates this stretch of US-93 as a Nevada Scenic Byway.

item.title: US-89 North - Garfield County
item.description: Entering Garfield County on US-89 north.

item.title: US-84/US-285 South - Santa Fe County Line
item.description: Santa Fe County Line on US-84/US-285 South. Taken on the south side of Española, which spans Rio Arriba and Santa Fe Counties.

item.title: NM-75 West - Rio Arriba County Line
item.description: Rio Arriba County Line on NM-75 west.

item.title: NM-76 North - Taos County
item.description: Entering Taos County on NM-76 north. County line signs in New Mexico tend to have the words "County Line" in all capital letters in a smaller font below the county name.

item.title: US-491 South - Dolores County
item.description: Dolores County on US-491 south. The Colorado welcome sign can be seen in the background. Taken at the Utah-Colorado state line.

item.title: US-30 West - Entering Caribou County
item.description: Entering Caribou County on US-30 west.

item.title: Welcome To Idaho - US-30 West
item.description: Welcome to Idaho on US-30 west. Entering Bear Lake County. Taken at the Wyoming-Idaho Border.

item.title: US-12 West - Walla Walla County
item.description: Entering Walla Walla County on US-12 west.

item.title: WA-260 West/WA-261 South - Franklin County
item.description: Entering Franklin County on WA-260 West/WA-261 south.

item.title: WA-26 - Adams County
item.description: Entering Adams County on WA-26 west crossing the Palouse River.

item.title: I-10 West - San Bernardino County Line
item.description: I-10 west at San Bernardino County Line, and Yucaipa City Limits.

item.title: Welcome To California - I-40 West
item.description: Welcome to California on I-40 west at the Arizona-California state line crossing the Colorado River. San Bernardino County line.

item.title: I-40 East - Entering Apache County
item.description: Entering Apache County on I-40 east.

item.title: I-84 East - Entering Umatilla County
item.description: Entering Umatilla County on I-84 east.

item.title: I-84 East - Entering Gilliam County
item.description: Entering Gilliam County on I-84 west, crossing the John Day River.

item.title: Silver Lake Road - Entering Klamath County
item.description: Entering Klamath County on Silver Lake Road west. All Klamath County welcome signs display the text, We Honor Veterans.

item.title: Welcome To California - US-97 South
item.description: Welcome to California on US-97 south. Siskiyou County Line. Taken at the Oregon-California border.

item.title: Entering Moffat County
item.description: Entering Moffat County Colorado at the Utah-Colorado State Line.

item.title: US-20 West - Entering Camas County
item.description: Entering Camas County on US-20 west at the Blaine-Camas County Line.

item.title: I-15 South - Entering Clark County
item.description: I-15 south Entering Clark Count and Leaving Montana. Taken on Monida Pass on the Continental Divide between Idaho and Montana.

item.title: I-15 North - Entering Clark County
item.description: Entering Clark County on I-15 north at the Jefferson - Clark County line.

item.title: ID-61 North - Entering Bear Lake County
item.description: Entering Bear Lake County on ID-61 north at the Idaho-Wyoming state line.

item.title: ID-55 North at Canyon County Line
item.description: ID-55 north crossing the Snake River and entering Canyon County.

item.title: US-50/BL-80 West - Yolo-Sacramento County Line
item.description: US-50/BL-80 west at the Yolo-Sacramento County Line at the Sacramento River. Also entering the city of West Sacramento.

item.title: US-50 West - Entering Carson City
item.description: US-50 west at the Lyon County - Carson City line. When entering all other counties in Nevada, the county name is above the words County Line. In Carson City, the County Line is replaced with State Capitol.

item.title: US-60 West - Entering La Paz County
item.description: Entering La Paz County on US-60 west at the La Paz - Maricopa County Line.

item.title: US-60 West - Entering Maricopa County
item.description: Entering Maricopa County on US-60 west at the Maricopa-Pinal County Line.

item.title: US-180 West - Catron County Line
item.description: Catron County Line on US-180 west at the Grant-Catron County Line.

item.title: I-10 East - Entering Cochise County
item.description: Entering Cochise County on I-10 east at the Pima-Cochise County Line.

item.title: I-10 East - Pima County Line
item.description: Entering Pima County on I-10 east. Also entering the town of Marana. Taken on the Pima-Pinal County Line.

item.title: WA-17 South Approaching WA-173 North
item.description: WA-17 south approaching WA-173 North/Bridgeport/Brewster. Crossing the Columbia River into Douglas County.

item.title: I-80 East - Storey County Line
item.description: I-80 east at Storey County Line and Truckee River.

item.title: US-95 North - Benewah County and Coeur d'Alene Indian Res.
item.description: US-95 north - Entering Benewah County and Coeur d’Alene Indian Reservation.

item.title: I-86 East - Entering Bannock County
item.description: I-86 east at Bannock county line at the Portneuf River.

item.title: CO-71 South - Weld County
item.description: Entering Weld County at the Colorado-Nebraska State Line on CO-71 south.

item.title: US-40 - Berthoud Pass
item.description: US-40 at Berthoud Pass. Continental Divide and Grand-Clear Creek County Line.

item.title: US-20 East - Santiam Pass/Jefferson County Line
item.description: US-20/OR-126 east at Santiam Pass, Jefferson-Linn County line.

item.title: ID-55 South - Owyhee County Line
item.description: ID-55 south at Snake River/Owyhee county line.

item.title: I-8 West - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome To California/Imperial County Line on the Colorado River on I-8 west at the Arizona line.

item.title: US-95 South - Entering Owyhee County and Snake River
item.description: US-95 South/ID-19 West - Entering Owyhee County / Snake River.

item.title: US-93 North - Lemhi County/Pahsimeroi River
item.description: US-93 North Entering Lemhi County at the Pahsimeroi River

item.title: ID-3 North - Kootenai County
item.description: Entering Kootenai County on ID-3 North
